params.sourceslist of str:
List of source file locations relative to the top directory of
the package.

params.extra_compile_argslist of str: Extra command line arguments to pass to the compiler.

params.extra_f77_compile_argslist of str: Extra command line arguments to pass to the fortran77 compiler.

params.extra_f90_compile_argslist of str: Extra command line arguments to pass to the fortran90 compiler.

get_info.description:
0 - do nothing
1 - display warning message
2 - raise error

get_standard_file.description:
Returns a list of files named ‘fname’ from
1) System-wide directory (directory-location of this module)
2) Users HOME directory (os.environ[‘HOME’])
3) Local directory
